Circle_PAD.synopsis: Players have clicked on a hidden ritual circle on a desk in SCL.The second option triggers if Gale already knows how to use it.
Circle_PAD.how_to_trigger: As non-Gale, go to S_SCL_BalthazarLab_Circle_fa45ff4b-27d6-45dc-85eb-488e5d3c6a77 and click on it.

automatic_ordering.reasoning: There is only one session provided (Circle_PAD) and no explicit dependencies or conflicting triggers involving other sessions. Although the synopsis mentions a conditional second option depending on Gale's knowledge, it does not introduce any ordering constraint relative to another session or any mutual exclusiveness rule that applies with another session.

Circle_PAD_0.speaker: Player
Circle_PAD_0.text: A ritual circle. Looks like it was used in the crafting of Moonlanterns.

Circle_PAD_1.speaker: Player
Circle_PAD_1.text: I'll let Gale deal with that particular problem.
